attributes.additional_details:
ALL People who are against terrorism, want to know why only 6 of your parliamentarians signed this EDM1029 as was tabled in BRITISH PARLIAMENT (Drafted by Richard Oldridge)

VISCOUNT MASSACRES

Session: 2012-13
Date tabled: 05.02.2013
Primary sponsor: Hoey, Kate
Sponsors: Bellingham, Henry Bottomley, Peter Hopkins, Kelvin McCrea, Dr William Shannon, Jim
That this House notes that 12 February 2013 will mark the 34th anniversary of the shooting down of Air Rhodesia Viscount Flight RH827 (the Umniati) by members of the Zimbabwe People's Revolutionary Army (ZIPRA) in the former Rhodesia resulting in the death of all on board;
